Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of color and trim designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Color and Trim Designs / Total Color and Trim Designs) * 100

Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.KPIS: Time to Market for Color and Trim
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of color and trim designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: Total Time from Color and Trim Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.KPIS: Customer Satisfaction with Color and Trim
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for color and trim designs.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Color and Trim / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.KPIS: Cost Adherence for Color and Trim
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for color and trim designs adhere to budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Color and Trim / Budgeted Cost for Color and Trim) * 100

Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of color matching in designs compared to the specified colors.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Colors and Trims / Total Colors and Trims Tested) * 100

Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency of material usage in color and trim processes.
Evaluates the quality of color and trim designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating for Color and Trim

Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.KPIS: Innovation Score in Color and Trim
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in color and trim designs.
Product Development+Design+Color and Tri.FORMULA: (Score Based on Innovations in Color and Trim)
